item.title: Medium: Probabilistic Justification for using specific Loss function in different types of Machine Learning Algorithms (Part 1)
item.description: Medium Link When I started with Machine Learning, one of the most troublesome thing that didnâ€™t make much sense was the choice of the Loss function for different Machine learning algorithms, justifications for using the specific loss function for different kinds of ML algorithms were most of the time based on intuition rather any formal mathematical proof this blog discuss the Mathematical Justification for using a specific kind of loss function in different types of supervised Machine learning algorithms through Probability
